channel.title: CVE Feed for Pepperl+Fuchs -- P+F Comtrol RocketLinx
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Pepperl+Fuchs -- P+F Comtrol RocketLinx

item.title: CVE-2020-12502|2024-09-16T18:43:33.813Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- p%2Bf%20comtrol%20rocketlinx
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below is prone to unauthenticated device administration.

item.title: CVE-2020-12504|2024-09-16T17:09:09.147Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- p%2Bf%20comtrol%20rocketlinx
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) and ICRL-M-8RJ45/4SFP-G-DIN, ICRL-M-16RJ45/4CP-G-DIN FW 1.2.3 and below has an active TFTP-Service.

item.title: CVE-2020-12501|2024-09-16T19:20:40.911Z -- pepperl%2Bfuchs -- p%2Bf%20comtrol%20rocketlinx
item.description: Improper Authorization vulnerability of Pepperl+Fuchs P+F Comtrol RocketLinx ES7510-XT, ES8509-XT, ES8510-XT, ES9528-XTv2, ES7506, ES7510, ES7528, ES8508, ES8508F, ES8510, ES8510-XTE, ES9528/ES9528-XT (all versions) use undocumented accounts.
